articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: Secret calculator hack brings ChatGPT to the TI-84, enabling easy cheating - Ars Technica
articles.description: Tiny device installed inside TI-84 enables Wi-Fi Internet, access to AI chatbot.
articles.content:
77
On Saturday, a YouTube creator called "ChromaLock" published a video detailing how he modified a Texas Instruments TI-84 graphing calculator to connect to the Internet and access OpenAI's ChatGPT… [+3072 chars]
